Package cat.nyaa.nyaacore.utils

Class IPCUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • cat.nyaa.nyaacore.utils.IPCUtils
  • public final class IPCUtils
extends Object
    Inter-Plugin Communication Utils If one plugin register events or methods here, other plugins can emit the event or call the method without directly depends on the plugin.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      IPCUtils()

      • registerEvent

        public static void registerEvent​(String name,
                                 Constructor<? extends Event> eventConstructor)
        Register an event and its constructor

        eventConstructor - the constructor

        args - constructor parameters
